alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 5:30PM MST until February 13 at 9:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet and East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
